tool_description: This API provides an extremely quick and simple parser which gives you clearly readable and defined information based on the provided UA string.
name: User Agent Parser
title: User Agent Parser

api_list.name: User Agent Parser
api_list.description: Returns parsed data from UA string in a readable format.

required_parameters.name: userAgentRaw
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 7_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/537.51.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/7.0 Mobile/11A465 Safari/9537.53 (compatible; bingbot/2.0; http://www.bing.com/bingbot.htm)
